ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: First Congradulations on our language ability. I also speak all race languages, Thieve s Cant, the 4 magical you know, and several MOB languages all to
ygData.messageBody:
First Congradulations on our language ability. I also speak all race languages, Thieve's Cant, the 4 magical you know, and several MOB languages all to excellent. The Magical language you are missing is rumored to be Old/Elder Dragon, well if monks
got Dragon at 30 possibly they may get Old Dragon at 40. On my server, Innoruuk, the highest monk in 36 so I am only guess at level and class. One more thing I want to throw in to toot my own horn I can't read Ipsor's Enlightenment # whatever
because I did all this and I am a level 7 Gnome Wizard so I am a long way from research, also one quick question seems all races except Gnomes get stuck, Elder Elvish/OE at Very Good and Elder Teir'dal/Combine at Good (doing zone trick), any
experience with this?


Lomack wrote:

> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
> Ok does anyone know what language is required to read Ipsor's Enlightenment
> IV (or maybe its V I forget but its the only other one sold in Freeport)
>
> I am now Excelent in 23 languages. Among them are
> Old Erudin, Elder Elvish, Kobold (Elder Teir'Dal), Giant Toung (Combine
> Toung), and Dragon.
> Basically I am excelent in every language I have found so far. All 23 but
> I still cant read that book. Do I need to work each language up to
> "Master" or is there another Language out there that no one knows about yet?
>
> Long Live the Brotherhood,
> Lomack, BCK-MoR
>
